channel.title: NPC spaz attacks[317]
channel.description:
I've noticed that after running a couple of events/encounters that involve npcs, will make some update block glitch, the npcs become spazzy, as in - they keep resetting their state (face direction update, emote update) every like....half a second... Well actually... The delay between spaz attacks depends on how much stuff has been done to the npcs...
Does anyone know what causes it?
Base: 317, delta, client-galkons base

item.title: NPC spaz attacks[317]
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

[quote=“fuzzout, post:3, topic:385680”]Do you mean their attack emotes…?

Could it be… AnimUpdate that does the glitching?[/quote]yea thats what i mean the attack emotes… and i’m not sure about AnimUpdate

Read full topic

item.title: NPC spaz attacks[317]

item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

your going to have to get the correct ints for the NPC and the model if there is one needed… cause it happens if you don’t have the npc attacking set up correctly… ik it didnt make since about the npc attacking i’m just trying to put it in words easily understood…
